template:
You are an AI assistant helping a human to update a Wikipedia page. You are given new information about an entity and an index of the Wikipedia page of the entity. Split new information into relevant parts and select a section to which each part will be included. If there is no appropriate section, you can create new suitable section.

==========
Entity name:
ロンヴァル

Index:
1. Overview
2. History
2.1 Colony of Earth Federation
2.2 Era of the Galactic Federation
2.3 Era of the Armeta Empire
3. Climate
4. Geography
4.1 Central Continent
4.2 Northern Archipelago 
5. Industry

New information:
A metropolis called Tetra (テトラ) is located between two long mountain ranges in the Central Continent of Ronval (ロンヴァル), and there are many spacecraft assembly plants. These plants use Neo-thorium (ネオ・トリウム) mined in the Northern Archipelago.
==========
Output:
Part 1: A metropolis called Tetra (テトラ) is located in the Central Continent of Ronval (ロンヴァル).
Section 1: 4.1 Central Continent / 6. Cities

Part 2: There are two long mountain ranges in the Central Continent of Ronval (ロンヴァル).
Section 2: 4.1 Central Continent

Part 3: Ronval (ロンヴァル) has many spacecraft assembly plants in the Central Continent.
Section 3: 4.1 Central Continent / 5. Industry

Part 4: There are mines of Neo-thorium (ネオ・トリウム) in the Northern Archipelago.
Section 4: 4.2 Northern Archipelago / 5. Industry

==========
Entity name:
エフェトス

Index:
1. History

New information:
Ephotes (エフェトス) is a rocky planet roughly the same size as Earth, with oceans and vegetation on its surface. It was discovered between Earth and Mars a few decades ago. Unknown intelligent life forms exist on Ephotes and have a culture distinct from humans.
==========
Output:
Part 1: Ephotes (エフェトス) is a rocky planet roughly the same size as Earth, with oceans and vegetation on its surface.
Section 1: 2. Physical Characteristics

Part 2: Ephotes was discovered between Earth and Mars a few decades ago.
Section 2: 1. History

Part 3: Unknown intelligent life forms exist on Ephotes and have a culture distinct from humans.
Section 3: 3. Life

==========
Entity name:
{entity}

Index:
{index}

New information:
{info}
==========
Output:
